flawed_nl_solution:
May will be able to make 2 x 3 = <<2*3=6>>6 red scarves.
She will be able to make 3 x 6 = <<3*6=18>>18 blue scarves.
And she will be able to make 4 x 3 = <<4*3=21>>21 yellow scarves.
Therefore the total scarves she can make is 21 + 18 + 6 = <<21+18+6=45>>45.
#### 45

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
